DOC.brief_summary: This study perform reduce unwanted abdominal fat use two different applicator Zeltiq System .
DOC.brief_title: Non-Invasive Reduction Abdominal Fat Utilizing CoolFlex eZ App 6.3 Applicators
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study evaluate performance CoolFlex applicator compare performance eZ App 6.3 applicator treatment abdominal fat term ability achieve discernable change contour treat area .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female subject > 18 year age < 65 year age . 2 . Subject clearly visible fat abdomen . ( Figure 1 ) 3 . Subject weight change exceed 10 pound precede month . 4 . Subject agree maintain weight ( i.e. , within 5 pound ) make major change diet lifestyle course study . 5 . Subject read sign write informed consent form . 1 . Subject surgical procedure ( ) area intend treatment . 2 . Subject invasive fat reduction procedure ( e.g. , liposuction , abdominoplasty , mesotherapy ) area intend treatment . 3 . Subject noninvasive fat reduction and/or body contour procedure area intend treatment within past 6 month . 4 . Subject discernable asymmetry contour irregularity intend treatment area . 5 . Subject need administer , know history subcutaneous injection area intend treatment ( e.g. , heparin , insulin ) within past month . 6 . Subject known history cryoglobulinemia , cold urticaria , paroxysmal cold hemoglobinuria . 7 . Subject known history Raynaud 's disease , know condition response cold exposure limit blood flow skin . 8 .
